title: Importing Configurations - Netskope Knowledge Portal
content: Run the following commands to import configurations to an appliance. scp import config from host <host-IP-address> mode <specify-mode> path <location-to-copy-to> user <user-name-on-the-remote-host> Note The default mode, “all” imports all configurations including the network interface. Specify the mode as “without-network” to import configurations but exclude the network interface.
